description.value:
You Interact with an item you're wielding or wearing that is benefiting from your zenith sparkle ability. Heal yourself or an ally within 30 feet for @Damage[6d6 + 6[healing]] Hit Points; you may instead deal damage of the type matching the item's primary gemstone to an enemy within 30 feet (@Damage[6d6 + 6]), with a @Check[fortitude|against:disciple|basic] save. At 15th level, this healing or damage is increased to @Damage[8d6 + 10[healing]] (healing) / @Damage[8d6 + 10] (damage).

Items of the same general type you wield or wear in the same slot or slots are unaffected by your zenith sparkle ability until your next daily preparations, such as all armor and shields if the item was either, or all miscellaneous worn items if the item was neither a piece of armor, a shield, nor a weapon.
